DOC.brief_summary: This trial aims to determine which treatment modality is better for treatment of the convergence insufficiency subtype of intermittent exotropia.
DOC.brief_title: Surgery and Convergence Insufficiency Intermittent Exotropia
DOC.criteria: Convergence Insufficiency Type Intermittent Exotropia No stereopsis Good visual acuity Amblyopia Anisometropia > 2.5D Vertical deviations
